title: Create Initial Project Budget
description: A project is being initiated, and a cost engineer needs to create the initial budget based on the conceptual estimate.

tasks.description: Retrieve the approved conceptual cost estimate for the project.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets the high-level cost estimate.

tasks.description: Import the cost estimate into the cost management system to create the baseline budget.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates the initial budget structure.

tasks.description: Allocate the budget across the top-level WBS elements.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent distributes the total budget among the main project areas like 'Engineering', 'Procurement', and 'Construction'.
